page.title: 19Nether Stowey: Leisure - 2
page.content: The more active members of this area indulge in several sports within the village and district. Nether Stowey has its own tennis courts and badminton can be played in the village hall. Skittles is a favourite Somerset pastime and numerous people play in teams and leagues. Football remains one of the most popular sports and the village has its own pitch at the recreation ground. There are also tennis courts and a cricket club at Over Stowey. Many locals enjoy swimming but have to travel to Bridgwater or Taunton to the heated pools. Local beaches are available to swimmers, though not ideal.Golf and squash facilities are not available in our area, although enthusiasts do travel to clubs further afield.
